aji ruth kar ab kaha jaiyega

chhu kar, mere man ko, kiyaa tune, kyaa ishaaraa
phir bhi jane kyon
dar koi aur khule na khule
teri yaad hain ya tera naam hain
mujhe gham dene wale tu khushi ko tarse mere dushman
nile gagan ke sare badal kar denge badnam
ho jogi meri shadi marzi se hogi ho
ishq nahi hum sikhe, ishq nahi hum sikhe
duniya mein aakar raha tu anadi duniya mein aakar raha tu anadi
hum to yahi jane tujhse badi
do salone vachan, tumko meri qasam
tum to machaal gaye, ho ho ho yunhi fisal gaye, ha ha ha
teri qasam ye hath hai mere magar
hum jis se daman bhar baithe
phuul jab khila to aayin shok titaliyaan
mere bhi ghar ho dhum dhadakka aur baje shehanaai
gaj-dhan raj-dhan
mummy ko manaaoge phir na use sataaoge
woh mera hoga, woh sapna tera hoga
jane kiski jeet hai ye jane kiski haar hai
badla zamana waha waha badla zamana
main nachu apne piya ke liye
teri yaad aa rahi hai, teri yaad aa rahi hai
aisi rimajhima me o saajan pyase pyase mere nayana
barkhaa ki raat me he ho haa
pyaar par bas to nahi hai
pyar hi me kho gaya
kya hotee hai prem kahaanee, yeh bhee tu naadaan naa jaanee
puchhe tumhi se ye hoga aur aage kya
tumhara badan chandani aake chhu le
duba suraj phir se nikle
maathe kaa sindur rulaave lat naagin ban jaaye
achchha mai sab bato ka, hisab rakhunga
o phir hamse naa ulajh
hotho pe leke teraa naam
haatha me tere joyo mehandi na laga di
chalayi wo aandhiya
vaapas na aauga mai jo chala jaauga
todenge dam magar tera sath na chhod enge
chaand kirano ki jaali pahan jhumataa
jisaki biwi kali usaka bhi bara nam hai
rag banaa basati bhagat sih rag aman kaa vir javaahar se,
aa jao tum naa do saja
dil diya dard liya kabhi phulo me guzari
mere naseeb mein tu hai ke nahi
kitna samjhau mai
kaisa nasib ne din ye dikhaya
ki tera mera tera mera sath rahega
